meanings.definition: Covered in or consisting of sand.
meanings.sent1: The beach was the sandiest place I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The sandbox in the park is always the sandiest after a rainy day.
meanings.sent3: The sandiest cat in the neighborhood loves to roll around in the sandbox.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, tousled by the wind, looked as if it had been dipped in the sandiest of beaches.
meanings.sent5: The sandiest path through the dunes led us to a hidden cove.

meanings.sent1: The sandiest desert stretched out endlessly before us.
meanings.sent2: The sandiest part of the beach is where the kids love to build sandcastles.
meanings.sent3: The sandiest bucket at the beach was overflowing with seashells.
meanings.sent4: Her pockets were filled with the sandiest treasures she could find.
meanings.sent5: The sandiest hour of the day was when the sun began to set over the dunes.

meanings.sent1: The artist used the sandiest colors to paint a realistic beach scene.
meanings.sent2: The sandiest paint texture gave the mural a lifelike sandy appearance.
meanings.sent3: The sandiest costume at the party was a clever sandcastle outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had the sandiest quality, like the sound of waves on the shore.
meanings.sent5: The sandiest sculpture in the exhibit looked like it was made of real sand.
